00056 void
00057 MRay::SetDir( const MVec3& dir )
00058 {
00059         _dir = dir;
00060         _dir.Normalize();
00061 }

00063 //----------------------------------------------------------
00064 void
00065 MRay::SetDirFast( const MVec3& dir )
00066 {
00068         B_ASSERT( Abs( dir.MagSqr() - 1.0f ) < 0.0001f );
00069         _dir = dir;
00070 }
00071 
00073 #define NUMDIM  3
00074 #define RIGHT   0
00075 #define LEFT    1
00076 #define MIDDLE  2
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------
00079 bool
00080 MRay::Intersect( const MAABox& box, float maxDist ) const
00081 {
00082         MVec3 hitLoc;
00083         return Intersect( hitLoc, box, maxDist );
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 bool
00088 MRay::Intersect( MVec3& hitLoc, const MAABox& box, float maxDist ) const
00089 {
00090         MVec3 minB = box.GetCenter() - box.GetHalfExts();
00091         MVec3 maxB = box.GetCenter() + box.GetHalfExts();
00092 
00093         bool inside = true;
00094         char quadrant[ NUMDIM ] = { 0, 0, 0 };
00095         register int i = 0;
00096         int whichPlane = 0;
00097         MVec3 maxT;
00098         MVec3 candidatePlane;
00099 
00102         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00103         {
00104                 if( _start[i] < minB[i] )
00105                 {
00106                         quadrant[i] = LEFT;
00107                         candidatePlane[i] = minB[i];
00108                         inside = false;
00109                 }
00110                 else if ( _start[i] > maxB[i] )
00111                 {
00112                         quadrant[i] = RIGHT;
00113                         candidatePlane[i] = maxB[i];
00114                         inside = false;
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         quadrant[i] = MIDDLE;
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 
00123         if ( inside )
00124                 return true;
00125 
00127         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00128         {
00129                 if ( quadrant[i] != MIDDLE && _dir[i] !=0.0f )
00130                         maxT[i] = ( candidatePlane[i] - _start[i] ) / _dir[i];
00131                 else
00132                         maxT[i] = -1.0f;
00133         }
00134 
00136         whichPlane = 0;
00137         for ( i = 1; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00138         {
00139                 if (maxT[whichPlane] < maxT[i])
00140                         whichPlane = i;
00141         }
00142 
00144         if ( maxT[whichPlane] < 0.0f || maxT[whichPlane] > maxDist )
00145                 return false;
00146 
00147         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00148         {
00149                 if ( whichPlane != i )
00150                 {
00151                         hitLoc[i] = _start[i] + maxT[whichPlane] * _dir[i];
00152                         if (hitLoc[i] < minB[i] || hitLoc[i] > maxB[i])
00153                                 return false;
00154                 }
00155                 else
00156                 {
00157                         hitLoc[i] = candidatePlane[i];
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 
00162         return true;
00163 }

00166 bool
00167 MRay::Intersect( const MOBox& box ) const
00168 {
00170         MMat4x4 xform;
00171         box.GetTransform().Inverse( xform );
00172         MMat3x3 normalRot = box.GetTransform().GetRotate();
00173         normalRot.Transpose();
00174 
00176         MVec3 start = _start;
00177         xform.TransformCoordNoPerspFast( start );
00178         MVec3 dir = _dir;
00179         normalRot.RotatePointFast( dir );
00180 
00182         MVec3 maxB = box.GetHalfExts();
00183         MVec3 minB = -box.GetHalfExts();
00184         MVec3 coord;
00185 
00186         bool inside = true;
00187         char quadrant[ NUMDIM] = { 0, 0, 0 };
00188         register int i = 0;
00189         int whichPlane = 0;
00190         MVec3 maxT;
00191         MVec3 candidatePlane;
00192 
00195         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00196         {
00197                 if( start[i] < minB[i] )
00198                 {
00199                         quadrant[i] = LEFT;
00200                         candidatePlane[i] = minB[i];
00201                         inside = false;
00202                 }
00203                 else if ( start[i] > maxB[i] )
00204                 {
00205                         quadrant[i] = RIGHT;
00206                         candidatePlane[i] = maxB[i];
00207                         inside = false;
00208                 }
00209                 else
00210                 {
00211                         quadrant[i] = MIDDLE;
00212                 }
00213         }
00214 
00216         if ( inside )
00217                 return true;
00218 
00220         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00221         {
00222                 if ( quadrant[i] != MIDDLE && dir[i] !=0.0f )
00223                         maxT[i] = ( candidatePlane[i] - start[i] ) / dir[i];
00224                 else
00225                         maxT[i] = -1.0f;
00226         }
00227 
00229         whichPlane = 0;
00230         for ( i = 1; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00231         {
00232                 if (maxT[whichPlane] < maxT[i])
00233                         whichPlane = i;
00234         }
00235 
00237         if ( maxT[whichPlane] < 0.0f )
00238                 return false;
00239 
00240         for ( i = 0; i < NUMDIM; ++i )
00241         {
00242                 if ( whichPlane != i )
00243                 {
00244                         coord[i] = start[i] + maxT[whichPlane] * dir[i];
00245                         if (coord[i] < minB[i] || coord[i] > maxB[i])
00246                                 return false;
00247                 }
00248                 else
00249                 {
00250                         coord[i] = candidatePlane[i];
00251                 }
00252         }
00253 
00255         return true;
00256 }

00345

00348

00353 //----------------------------------------------------------
00354 bool
00355 MRay::Intersect( const MSphere& sphere ) const
00356 {
00358         MVec3 hyp = ( sphere.GetCenter() - _start );
00359 
00361         float t = _dir.Dot( hyp );
00362 
00367         if ( t <= 0.0f )
00368                 return ( _start.Dist( sphere.GetCenter() ) <= sphere.GetRadius() );
00369 
00372         return ( hyp.Dist( t * _dir ) <= sphere.GetRadius() );
00373 }
00374 
00375 //----------------------------------------------------------
00376 bool
00377 MRay::Intersect( MVec3& hitPos, const MPlane& plane, float maxDist ) const
00378 {
00381         float dist = plane.Dist( _start );
00382         float absDist = Abs( dist );
00383         if ( absDist > maxDist )
00384                 return false;
00385 
00389         float t = plane.GetNormal().Dot( _dir );
00390         if ( dist < 0.0f && t <= 0.0f )
00391                 return false;
00392         else if ( dist > 0.0f && t >= 0.0f )
00393                 return false;
00394         else if ( Abs( t ) < 0.001f )
00395                 return false;
00396 
00397         float cscTheta = 1.0f / -t;
00398 
00401         hitPos = _start + cscTheta * dist * _dir;
00402         return true;
00403 }
00404 
00405 //----------------------------------------------------------
00406 MRay
00407 MRay::Transform( const MMat4x4& mat, const MMat3x3& normalRot ) const
00408 {
00409         return MRay( mat.TransformCoord( _start ), normalRot.RotatePoint( _dir ) );
00410 }

00412 //----------------------------------------------------------
00413 bool
00414 MRay::Intersect( MVec3& point, float& u, float& v, const MVec3& pt0, const MVec3& pt1, const MVec3& pt2, bool twoSided ) const
00415 {
00417         MVec3 b = pt1 - pt0;
00418         MVec3 c = pt2 - pt0;
00419         MVec3 vec = _start - pt0;
00420 
00423         MVec3 faceNormal = b.Cross( c );
00424         if ( faceNormal.MagSqr() < MVec3::kNormalizeEpsilon )
00425                 return false;
00426 
00428         faceNormal.Normalize();
00429 
00431         float d = 0.0f;
00432         if ( twoSided )
00433         {
00434                 d = Abs( _dir.Dot( faceNormal ) );
00435         }
00436         else
00437         {
00439                 d = _dir.Dot( faceNormal );
00440                 if ( d >= 0.0001f )
00441                         return false;
00442         }
00443 
00445         float distance = -vec.Dot( faceNormal ) / d;
00446 
00448         point = _start + distance * _dir;
00449         MVec3 p = point - pt0;
00450 
00451         float maxAxis = faceNormal.AbsMax();
00452         int domAxis = 0;
00453         for ( ; domAxis < 3; ++domAxis )
00454         {
00455                 if ( Abs( maxAxis - Abs( faceNormal[ domAxis ] ) ) < 0.0001f )
00456                         break;
00457         }
00458 
00460         int a0 = 0;
00461         int a1 = 1;
00462         if ( domAxis == 0 )
00463         {
00464                 a0 = 1;
00465                 a1 = 2;
00466         }
00467         else if ( domAxis == 1 )
00468         {
00469                 a0 = 0;
00470                 a1 = 2;
00471         }
00472         else
00473         {
00474                 a0 = 0;
00475                 a1 = 1;
00476         }
00477 
00479 //      u = ( p.GetY()*c.GetX()-p.GetX()*c.GetY() ) / ( b.GetY()*c.GetX() - b.GetX()*c.GetY() );
00480 //      v = ( p.GetY()*b.GetX()-p.GetX()*b.GetY() ) / ( c.GetY()*b.GetX() - c.GetX()*b.GetY() );
00481         u = ( p[a1]*c[a0] - p[a0]*c[a1] ) / ( b[a1]*c[a0] - b[a0]*c[a1] );
00482         v = ( p[a1]*b[a0] - p[a0]*b[a1] ) / ( c[a1]*b[a0] - c[a0]*b[a1] );
00483 
00485         return ( u >= 0.0f && v >= 0.0f && ( u + v ) <= 1.0f );
00486 }

00488 //----------------------------------------------------------
00489 bool
00490 MRay::Intersect( float& dist, MVec3& point, float& u, float& v, const MVec3& pt0, const MVec3& pt1, const MVec3& pt2, bool twoSided , float maxDist ) const
00491 {
00493         MVec3 b = pt1 - pt0;
00494         MVec3 c = pt2 - pt0;
00495         MVec3 vec = _start - pt0;
00496 
00499         MVec3 faceNormal = b.Cross( c );
00500         if ( faceNormal.MagSqr() < 0.001f )
00501                 return false;
00502 
00504         faceNormal.NormalizeFast();
00505 
00507         float d = 0.0f;
00508         if ( twoSided )
00509         {
00510                 d = Abs( _dir.Dot( faceNormal ) );
00511         }
00512         else
00513         {
00515                 d = _dir.Dot( faceNormal );
00516                 if ( d >= 0.0001f )
00517                         return false;
00518         }
00519 
00521         float distance = -vec.Dot( faceNormal ) / d;
00522         if ( distance >= maxDist )
00523                 return false;
00524 
00526         point = _start + distance * _dir;
00527         MVec3 p = point - pt0;
00528 
00529         float maxAxis = faceNormal.AbsMax();
00530         int domAxis = 0;
00531         for ( ; domAxis < 3; ++domAxis )
00532         {
00533                 if ( Abs( maxAxis - Abs( faceNormal[ domAxis ] ) ) < 0.0001f )
00534                         break;
00535         }
00536 
00538         int a0 = 0;
00539         int a1 = 1;
00540         if ( domAxis == 0 )
00541         {
00542                 a0 = 1;
00543                 a1 = 2;
00544         }
00545         else if ( domAxis == 1 )
00546         {
00547                 a0 = 0;
00548                 a1 = 2;
00549         }
00550         else
00551         {
00552                 a0 = 0;
00553                 a1 = 1;
00554         }
00555 
00557 //      u = ( p.GetY()*c.GetX()-p.GetX()*c.GetY() ) / ( b.GetY()*c.GetX() - b.GetX()*c.GetY() );
00558 //      v = ( p.GetY()*b.GetX()-p.GetX()*b.GetY() ) / ( c.GetY()*b.GetX() - c.GetX()*b.GetY() );
00559         u = ( p[a1]*c[a0] - p[a0]*c[a1] ) / ( b[a1]*c[a0] - b[a0]*c[a1] );
00560         v = ( p[a1]*b[a0] - p[a0]*b[a1] ) / ( c[a1]*b[a0] - c[a0]*b[a1] );
00561 
00563         if ( u >= 0.0f && v >= 0.0f && ( u + v ) <= 1.0f )
00564         {
00565                 dist =  distance;
00566                 return true;
00567         }
00568         else
00569                 return false;
00570 }

00572 //----------------------------------------------------------
00573 bool
00574 MRay::Intersect( MVec3& point, float& u, float& v, const MVec3& pt0, const MVec3& pt1, const MVec3& pt2,
00575                              const MVec3& faceNormal, bool twoSided ) const
00576 {
00578         MVec3 b = pt1 - pt0;
00579         MVec3 c = pt2 - pt0;
00580         MVec3 vec = _start - pt0;
00581 
00583         float d = 0.0f;
00584         if ( twoSided )
00585         {
00586                 d = Abs( _dir.Dot( faceNormal ) );
00587         }
00588         else
00589         {
00591                 d = _dir.Dot( faceNormal );
00592                 if ( d >= 0.0001f )
00593                         return false;
00594         }
00595 
00597         float distance = -vec.Dot( faceNormal ) / d;
00598 
00600         point = _start + distance * _dir;
00601         MVec3 p = point - pt0;
00602 
00603         float maxAxis = faceNormal.AbsMax();
00604         int domAxis = 0;
00605         for ( ; domAxis < 3; ++domAxis )
00606         {
00607                 if ( Abs( maxAxis - Abs( faceNormal[ domAxis ] ) ) < 0.0001f )
00608                         break;
00609         }
00610 
00612         int a0 = 0;
00613         int a1 = 1;
00614         if ( domAxis == 0 )
00615         {
00616                 a0 = 1;
00617                 a1 = 2;
00618         }
00619         else if ( domAxis == 1 )
00620         {
00621                 a0 = 0;
00622                 a1 = 2;
00623         }
00624         else
00625         {
00626                 a0 = 0;
00627                 a1 = 1;
00628         }
00629 
00631 //      u = ( p.GetY()*c.GetX()-p.GetX()*c.GetY() ) / ( b.GetY()*c.GetX() - b.GetX()*c.GetY() );
00632 //      v = ( p.GetY()*b.GetX()-p.GetX()*b.GetY() ) / ( c.GetY()*b.GetX() - c.GetX()*b.GetY() );
00633         u = ( p[a1]*c[a0] - p[a0]*c[a1] ) / ( b[a1]*c[a0] - b[a0]*c[a1] );
00634         v = ( p[a1]*b[a0] - p[a0]*b[a1] ) / ( c[a1]*b[a0] - c[a0]*b[a1] );
00635 
00637         return ( u >= 0.0f && v >= 0.0f && ( u + v ) <= 1.0f );
00638 }

00640 //----------------------------------------------------------
00641 float
00642 MRay::Dist( const MVec3& point ) const
00643 {
00645         MVec3 hyp = ( point - _start );
00646 
00648         float t = _dir.Dot( hyp );
00649 
00653         if ( t <= 0.0f )
00654                 return _start.Dist( point );
00655 
00657         return hyp.Dist( t * _dir );
00658 }

00666 
00667 //----------------------------------------------------------
00668 float
00669 MRay::Dist( const MLineSegment& segment, float epsilon ) const
00670 {
00671         float rayMu = 0.0f;
00672         float segMu = 0.0f;
00673         return Dist( segment, rayMu, segMu, epsilon );
00674 }
00675 
00676 //----------------------------------------------------------
00677 float
00678 MRay::Dist( const MLineSegment& segment, float& rayMu, float& segMu, float epsilon ) const
00679 {
00682         //
00686         //        closest end point is used.
00687         //
00690         //
00694         //
00697         //
00698         const MVec3& pt0 = segment.GetPt0();
00699         const MVec3& pt1 = segment.GetPt1();
00700 
00702         MVec3 p13( pt0 - _start );
00703 
00706         MVec3 p21( pt1 - pt0 );
00707 
00709         if ( Abs( p21.GetX() ) < epsilon && Abs( p21.GetY() ) < epsilon && Abs( p21.GetZ() ) < epsilon )
00710                 return Dist( pt1 );
00711 
00712         float d1343 = p13.Dot( _dir ); 
00713         float d4321 = _dir.Dot( p21 ); 
00714         float d1321 = p13.Dot( p21 );  
00715         float d2121 = p21.MagSqr();        
00716 
00717         float denom = d2121 - d4321 * d4321;
00718         if ( Abs( denom ) < epsilon )   
00719                 return Dist( pt1 );
00720 
00721         float numer = d1343 * d4321 - d1321;
00722 
00724         segMu = numer / denom;
00725         rayMu = (d1343 + d4321 * segMu);
00726 
00728         if ( rayMu < 0.0f )
00729         {
00730                 if ( segMu < 0.0f )
00731                         return _start.Dist( pt0 );
00732                 else if ( segMu > 1.0f )
00733                         return _start.Dist( pt1 );
00734                 else
00735                         return _start.Dist( pt0 + segMu * p21 );
00736         }
00737         else if ( segMu < 0.0f )
00738         {
00740                 return pt0.Dist( _start + rayMu * _dir );
00741         }
00742         else if ( segMu > 1.0f )
00743         {
00745                 return pt1.Dist( _start + rayMu * _dir );
00746         }
00747 
00749         return ( pt0 + segMu * p21 ).Dist( _start + rayMu * _dir );
00750 }
